page.title: 11My Family.
page.content: In my family I have my Mummy and Daddy, brother and sister, 2 cats,2 rabbits, and 10 chickens. On a week day we get up and dress, have breakfast and go to school. When we get to school we have assembly then we do some work. We have our milk and go out to play. At that time my Mum would be tidying the house, and Dad would be at work. When we are back in from play we sometimes watch a TV programme and talk about it. By the time we have finished talking about it, we would have lunch. Mum would be having her lunch and feeding the baby. We would go out to play again and do some more work. My brother would do some work too. Then we go home. I would feed the pets, and watch some TV, and have tea, and go to bed.
